DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator to ask if a patient has been diagnosed with immunodeficiency (compromised immune system which more easily permits development of infection or disease).

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the diagnosis of immunodeficiency.

Concepts.definition: A disorder in which the immune system is unable to mount an adequate immune response.

Property.preferredDefinition: The process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms.

Concepts.definition: The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or unknown.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 4-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reeves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 3/35/2016 jk removed "indeterminate" value that was added in error. 7/7/2021wz: added ALT VM name for HOPE-CARE project.

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a known immune impairment and unable to respond to anti-CTLA 4 antibody?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Known history of immunodeficiency disorder other than HIV-positive status

ReferenceDocuments.name: PBTC_Text1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a history of an immune deficiency?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRg CRF_Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have history of active primary immunodeficiency including, but not limited to Acquired Immune Deficiency Syndrome (AIDS) based upon current CDC definition?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a diagnosis of immunodeficiency or receiving systemic steroid therapy or any other form of immunosuppressive therapy within 7 days prior to the first dose of study therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF TEXT 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have an underlying immune deficiency, chronic infections including hepatitis, tuberculosis (TB), or autoimmune disease?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF_Text 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a history of active primary immunodeficiency?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_eCRF_text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have history or risk of autoimmune disease that would exclude them from the study as defined in protocol section 3.3.11?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_eCRF_Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a diagnosis of immunodeficiency within 7 days prior to study registration?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a diagnosis of immunodeficiency or is receiving systemic steroid therapy or any other form of immunosuppressive therapy within 2 weeks prior to randomization?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_eCRF_Text_1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a diagnosis of immunodeficiency within 7 days prior to Step 1 registration?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG CRF TEXT 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a known immune impairment and may be unable to respond to anti-CTLA 4 antibody?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_eCRF_Text_2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a diagnosis of immunodeficiency or is receiving systemic steroid therapy or any other form of immunosuppressive therapy within 7 days prior to enrollment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_eCRF_Text_4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a diagnosis of immunodeficiency or is the patient receiving systemic steroid therapy or any other form of immunosuppressive therapy within 2 weeks prior to study entry?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_eCRF_Text_3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a diagnosis of immunodeficiency?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_eCRF_Text_5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a known immune impairment and may be unable to respond to anti-CTLA-4 antibody?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have active immune deficiency?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient been diagnosed with an immunodeficiency?

DataElement.changeDescription: Replaced VD Assessment Ind-3 (2018441v1) with VD Yes No Unknown Indicator (3506034v1) - dbw
DataElement.administrativeNotes: 2023.11.3 AQT added per ticket request CADSR0003032. ak
